Question: This person was present at Lenny Bruce's arrest for obscenity.
Hints: In 1959, this person and Jack Burns began as a comedy team when both were working for radio station KXOL in Fort Worth, Texas.
All of this person's albums from this time forward are from the HBO specials.
Labeled an "unproductive airman" by his superiors, this person was discharged on July 29, 1957.
